    "Cookie": global.get("Cookie"),

name: è·å–äº¤ä»˜è¿›åº¦-æˆåŠŸ
func:
var logo_link = msg.payload.data.backdropPictures.backdropPicture
var orderStatusName = msg.payload.data.statusInfo.orderStatusName
var delivery_time = msg.payload.data.orderTimeInfo.deliveryTime
var add_time = msg.payload.data.orderTimeInfo.addTime
var pay_time = msg.payload.data.orderTimeInfo.payTime
var lock_time = msg.payload.data.orderTimeInfo.lockTime
var goods_names = msg.payload.data.orderItem.map(item => item.goodsName || "").join("|");

global.set("error_times", 0)
global.set("deliveryTimeLatest", delivery_time)

var text = `${global.get("delivery_date_range")}\n\nğŸ“… ä¸‹å®šæ—¶é—´ï¼š${add_time}\nğŸ’³ æ”¯ä»˜æ—¶é—´ï¼š${pay_time}\nğŸ”’ é”å•æ—¶é—´ï¼š${lock_time}\n\nğŸ›ï¸ é…ç½®ï¼š${goods_names}${global.get("carshop_notice_text")}`
var msg = { "delivery_time": delivery_time, "logo_link": logo_link, "text": text, "orderStatusName": orderStatusName }
return msg;
